p: As the blockade done due to COVID-19 coincides with the “Rabi” harvest season, the farmers completely relied on the Government to make sure proper crop harvesting was achieved without any interruptions. The waiving restriction on the intra- and inter-state movement of farmers or laborers, as well as harvesting and related farm machines, was a right step taken by the Union Home Ministry [32, 33]. While ensuring the provision of workers for critical farm management, the Government system should prioritize its safety (protection from COVID-19) and welfare.
